original_text: My Father has given them to me. He is greater than all things. Nobody can ever take my sheep out of my Father's hand.
korean_text: 그들을 주신 내 아버지는 만물보다 크시매 아무도 아버지 손에서 빼앗을 수 없느니라

sentences.original_text: My Father has given them to me.
He is greater than all things.
Nobody can ever take my sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 내 양들을 빼앗아 갈 수 없다.
